entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore appeared in the entrance and was described as having something impressive about him framed in the doorway against an oddly misty night.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge was mentioned as saying 'Yours, Professor Dumbledore?' with a singularly unpleasant little laugh.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney sat, tearstained and trembling, upon her trunk.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall was mentioned as being alongside Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was mentioned as not being able to imagine what Dumbledore had been doing out in the grounds.

relationships.description: Umbridge mentioned that she and the Minister of Magic had signed an Order of Dismissal, which Dumbledore did not understand.
Dumbledore strode forward through the circle of onlookers toward Professor Trelawney, who was sitting upon her trunk.
Umbridge confronted Dumbledore with the Order of Dismissal and questioned his understanding of the position.
